Description: Blue glazed composition amuletic figure of Harpocrates squatting and wearing the nemes with a side-lock; hole in the top of the head for the attachment of a headdress(now lost); suspension ring at the back; the arms are lost.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.16
Condition: incomplete - arms and headdress lost; surface damaged
